Volunteer for Immigrant Justice

Get involved with organizations supporting immigrants, refugees, and those impacted by ICE. Your time and skills can make a real difference! To donate money, food, or other resources to immigrant causes, check out the Donate page.

1000 District Ave

  • You can donate food and essentials on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, and Saturday.
  • Contact info@fixice.org for more information on other projets to work on, such as coffee table, organizing supplies, etc
  • Please check with group leaders to find out what is needed most.
  • The local food bank serves a large immigrant population.
  • The hub supply provides essential resources to those in need.
    • Order red cards for free (PDF)
    • Get stuff on TrashNothing or FreeStuff (same PDF)
    • Email PajamaActivism@proton.me for other opportunities

Organizations

  • MIRA Coalition (Massachusetts Immigrant & Refugee Advocacy Coalition) – Volunteer with MIRA
  • ACLU of Massachusetts – Volunteer with ACLU MA
  • RAICES (Refugee and Immigrant Center for Education and Legal Services, national) – Volunteer with RAICES
  • Local Sanctuary/Immigrant Support Groups – Check with your local faith or community organizations for volunteer opportunities supporting immigrants and refugees.
